game.name: Dunk Shot
game.description:
We know that you are a nice basketball player. But you have to perform to show off your talent to prove yourself in front of this cruel world. Grab your ball and be prepared to shoot some hoops without having the ball fall off of the screen in Dunk Shot! Remember missing your shot will take you out of the game and you would have no other option but to start your game all over again. Challenge your basketball playing abilities and play more and more perfect shots!

This is a free-falling basketball through which you have to score baskets in this highly addictive sports game! With every successful basket, you would score some points that will allow you to unlock new balls in the future. Try to keep your ball away from the rim when you swish the basketballs to secure an added bonus! No need to get bored as you can score in style by purchasing new cool basketball skins with the help of stars you collect throughout the game.

The baskets will reach at a new high place every time when you score basket successfully. Make sure to score basket to basket to earn your points. Aim ball by touching and dragging and then release to shoot your ball in this cool addictive arcade game! Put your finger on your mouse or tap the screen of your mobile phone to pour the basketball from one basket to another! Collect stars and try to dunk as many times as you can to create your best high score!

game.mobileControlKeys: SWIPE THE SCREEN TO SELECT THE DIRECTION AND RELEASE TO MAKE A GOLE
game.webControlKeys: L CLICK OF MOUSE AND PRESS TO AIM, RELESE TO MAKE THE GOLE
